result.title: Comprehensive, evidence-based explanatory and foresight model
result.description: Based on the findings of the ABM simulation models, ySKILLS will present a comprehensive, evidence-based explanatory and foresight model predicting the complex impacts of ICT use on cognitive, physical, psychological and social wellbeing of children and adolescents in Europe.

result.description: The findings of the ySKILLS project will be translated in evidence-based recommendations for policy and practice including the outcomes of both the youth co-design jams in task 7.2 and the expert roundtable in task 7.3. It will be a multimedia format (text, video, infographics).

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: A Data Management Plan (DMP) will be prepared, describing the data management life cycle for all datasets that will be collected, processed or generated by the research project. Detailed information on the procedures for data collection, storage, protection, retention, and destruction will be included, compliant with national and EU legislation. As the DMP is a dynamic plan, it will be updated each year (M5, M18, M30, M42).

result.title: High-level legal report
result.description: Based in the mapping recommendations onto the EU legal and policy frameworks (Task 7.4), a high-level legal report will be presented, detailing how EU policy / legal framework should be revised to advance an evidence-based EU policy and regulatory framework for youth wellbeing in the digital age.

result.title: Report on the interviews with experts on digital skills in schools and the labour market
result.description: The findings of the interviews with experts on education and the labour market (Task 3.1) will be presented in this report, with a focus on the analysis of the role of digital skills education in schools and informal learning settings, and the (digital) skills needed in the 21st century to cope with technological transformations in the labour market.
